About Me!

About Me

Hello! I am a Software Engineer currently residing in Queens, New York. I enjoy exploring new ideas and working with complex concepts. Originally starting off my college career majoring in accounting and elementary education, I found that they were not a good fit. I tried my hands at software development, in which I've come to fall in love with it. I look forward to working along like-minded people to innovate useful software for others.
